sentences.sContent: We would like to save them, but they have got to save themselves, and I do not believe they are willing to save themselves. They could be restructured the right way, and they do not want to do that.
sentences.sCn: 我们想要拯救他们，但他们必须自己拯救自己，然而，我认为他们并不愿意自己求自己，他们能够按照正确的方式进行整改，但他们并不想这么做。
